title: Wine cooler, one of a pair
text: The Minneapolis Institute of Arts' Twentieth Annual Antiques Show and Sale will be held at International Market Square in Minneapolis from October 17-19.  A special event for beginning collectors, "Eat, Drink, and Start Collecting," will feature a wine theme, and wine-related antiques similar to this wine cooler from the over 40 dealers at the show.  Please inquire at the Visitor Services Desk for more information on the Antiques Show and Sale and related events.
